config.history:
Lilia is a supporting character in Hero Without a Class: Who Even Needs Skills?! and the current leader of the Dragon Fang Guild. Once renowned as a powerful and respected adventurer organization, the Dragon Fang Guild has since declined, becoming a shadow of its former self by the time Lilia assumes leadership.

Although her specific job class is never explicitly named, the narrative focuses on her responsibility as a leader and her efforts to restore the guildâ€™s reputation rather than her system-assigned abilities. Her storyline emphasizes perseverance, and leadership in the face of inherited decline.
